thread.title: Heat guard Gerald Green fined $25,000 for menacing gestures
thread.title_full: Heat guard Gerald Green fined $25,000 for menacing gestures - ABC News

author: abcNEWS
title: Heat guard Gerald Green fined $25,000 for menacing gestures
text:
NEW YORK -- Miami Heat guard Gerald Green was fined $25,000 by the NBA on Friday for making menacing gestures in an exhibition game.
The incidents occurred after Green made 3-pointers with 5:33 and 5:12 left in Miami's 110-105 victory over Washington on Wednesday night.
Green appeared to make gun and throat-slash gestures after each shot.
Green, who finished with 28 points, joined the Heat as a free agent in July, when he signed a one-year deal worth $1.4 million.
The Associated Press contributed to this report.
